com.github.kaiwinter.androidremotenotifications.model.impl

Class PersistentNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.kaiwinter.androidremotenotifications.model.impl.PersistentNotification

  • public final class PersistentNotification
extends java.lang.Object
    A PersistentNotification is a UserNotification which can be stored in the shared preferences. It stores metadata about the UserNotification such as last shown date etc.
